en_text: What do you mean by that?!
jp_text: どういう意味よ

en_text: ln that case...
jp_text: それなら… あっ

en_text: Take it easy man!
jp_text: 帰っちゃダメだよ

en_text: Be careful!
jp_text: 気をつけてね

en_text: Don't catch cold!
jp_text: 風邪ひくなよ

en_text: See you guys!
jp_text: じゃあな

en_text: How you use this...will be your decision Kazuki.
jp_text: カズキ君　君が決めて

en_text: The truth is, l've already decided.
jp_text:
（カズキ）
ホントは もう決まっている

en_text: l know that.
jp_text: 頭では分かっている

en_text: But if l do that, I'll...
jp_text: けど… そしたら俺は

en_text: l will protect everyone...
jp_text: 俺がみんなを守るから

en_text: but will somebody please protect me?!
jp_text: 誰か俺を守ってくれ

en_text: Are you all right?
jp_text: 大丈夫か

en_text: Tokiko, what are you doing here?
jp_text: 斗貴子さん どうして ここに？

en_text: This is my special place...
jp_text:
（斗貴子）
ここは私の特等席だ

en_text: Oh, that's right...
jp_text: そうだったね

en_text: lt's not like you to leave early.
jp_text:
先に帰るなんて
カズキらしくない
google_translated:
I'm going back soon
It is not like Kazuki

en_text: Everyone was worried about you.
jp_text: みんな 心配してたぞ

en_text: Oh yeah, Kazuki...
jp_text: あ… うん

en_text: Look. Over there.
jp_text: （斗貴子）見ろ あそこ

en_text: You tried to protect me that time.
jp_text:
あの時 君は
私を守ろうとしてくれたな
google_translated:
That time you
I tried to protect me

en_text: Thank you.
jp_text: ありがとう

en_text: That day, l jumped in without thinking.
jp_text:
あの時 俺は
何も考えずに飛び出した
google_translated:
At that time I
I jumped out without thinking anything

en_text: l was simply determined to protect the girl in front of my eyes.
jp_text:
目の前の女の子を守ろうと
ただ 必死だった
google_translated:
Let's protect the girl in front of you
She was just desperate

en_text: lf anything, it has grown stronger.
jp_text: むしろ より強く

en_text: l want to protect her!
jp_text: 守りたい

en_text: l've decided, Tokiko.
jp_text:
（カズキ）
決まったよ 斗貴子さん

en_text: l am a bit lacking in courage.
jp_text: でも… まだ少し勇気が足りない

en_text: ln that case, l will make up for what you lack.
jp_text:
それなら
足りない分は私から補え
google_translated:
in that case
I feel sorry for the lack of enough

en_text: lt's as l once said.
jp_text:
（斗貴子）
いつかの夜に言ったとおり
google_translated: As I said at the night

en_text: The time when you die, is also the time when l die.
jp_text: 君が死ぬ時が 私が死ぬ時
google_translated: When I die when I die

en_text: Staking your final hopes on one thing alone, the white kakugane,
jp_text:
（斗貴子）
たった１つ 白の核鉄に
最後の希望を託し
google_translated:
On one white nucleated iron
I entrust the last hope

en_text: But Kazuki, l will not let you go alone.
jp_text: 君を１人では行かせない
google_translated: I can not go with you alone

en_text: Next time: "When You Die, I'll Die With You."
jp_text:
次回
「君が死ぬ時が私が死ぬ時」
google_translated:
next time
"When I die when I die"
